samples.name: Default
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Range Navigator control shows the default rendering of range navigator with range area series.

samples.name: Lightweight
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Range Navigator control shows the rendering of light-weight range navigator.

samples.name: DateTime
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Range Navigator control shows how to plot date-time values in range navigator.

samples.name: Numeric Axis
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Range Navigator control shows how to plot numeric data values in the range navigator.

samples.name: Logarithmic Axis
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Range Navigator control shows how to visualize the logarithmic scale when data has wide range of values.

samples.name: Multilevel Labels
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Range Navigator control shows how to display the second level labels in range navigator.

samples.name: Period Selector
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Range Navigator control shows how to display the period selector for a range with specified periods.

samples.name: Empty Points
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Range Navigator control shows how to render the empty points in the range navigator.

samples.name: Filter
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Range Navigator control shows how to bind the filtered values of the range navigator to grid control.

samples.name: Print and Export
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Range Navigator control shows how to print the charts and export the chart contents to various formats at client-side.

samples.name: RTL
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Range Navigator control shows how to invert an axis in the range navigator.
